item.title: US Keyboard, UK settings: AKA where's my pipe?
item.description: SSHed into a local Debian 9 server with a USB-attached US ANSI keyboard only to find the settings geared-up for a UK ISO keyboard. Not a biggie except for the location of the “|” … pretty important as chars go ðŸ˜‹ So… sudo install console-common sudo dpkg-reconfigure keyboard-configuration Follow all the things sudo service keyboard-setup restart PROFIT!!
